modName: Lord of the Rings Weapons and Armor Project --- ElSte17
summary: Project to add certain weapons and armor from LOTR to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone, this is a personal project I am starting now ( I only have one weapon done but I figured there was no reason not to make it available already). 

I realize that Isilmeriel has already made many very nice weapons from the LOTR series, but I don\'t think she will make ALL of them ( nor has she made any armor). So basically, when I\'m not working on the Alagaesia Total Conversion mod, I\'ll be adding more models to this mod.


What is there so far? :

- Easterling
- Halberd --------- (craft at forge, 2 iron and 2 steel ingots)




What do I plan on doing next?
- It\'ll be tough, but the rather complex Easterling Torso Armor

Hope you like it, feel free to make balancing suggestions.
author: ElSte17
